_instructions.task: Generate 12-15 practice phrases per LEGO using recent seed_pairs as pattern inspiration
_instructions.pattern_matching: Use recent_seed_pairs sentences as natural language pattern examples
_instructions.lego_coverage_requirement: Practice phrases MUST use at least 60% of the LEGOs listed in recent_seed_pairs[seed_id][1]
_instructions.vocabulary_source: Prioritize LEGOs from recent_seed_pairs[seed_id][1] + current_seed_legos_available, then any words from sentences
_instructions.overgeneration: Generate 12-15 phrases knowing some may be filtered by GATE validation
_instructions.quality: Semantic meaning + syntactic correctness + pedagogical value
_instructions.format: Array format: ["English phrase", "Spanish phrase", null, lego_count]
